description: Phase 7.2: Build the Commodity Track intake flow for non-High-Ticket businesses.

userStories.title: Add business model qualifier to intake
userStories.description: Allow users to specify if they are High-Ticket Service vs. SaaS/E-commerce/Brick & Mortar
acceptanceCriteria: Radio button group with 'High-Ticket Service' and 'SaaS/E-commerce/Brick & Mortar' choices appears on Intake form.
Selection is saved to 'businessModel' field in the BusinessContext store.

userStories.title: Display waitlist form for SaaS/E-commerce track
userStories.description: Show a waitlist form when the user is NOT a High-Ticket business.
acceptanceCriteria: If 'SaaS/E-commerce/Brick & Mortar' is selected, redirect or show a Waitlist form component.
Form contains an email input field and a 'Join Waitlist' button.

userStories.title: Handle Waitlist form submission
userStories.description: Save the email to Supabase and show a success message.
acceptanceCriteria: Submitting the waitlist form saves the email to the 'waitlist' table in Supabase.
Shows a success message: 'We will notify you when your track is ready!'
